pv21:9.3: abbuhe → abbūheyya (bj) | abbuyha (s2, s3) | abhuyha (pts1-2) | ubbahe (?)
pv21:30.1: kuṇā → kuṇṭhā (bj, pts2) | kuṇḍā (s2, s3, pts1)
pv21:30.2: kuṇalīkataṃ → kuṇḍalīkataṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2, mr)
pv21:38.4: yaṃtumassa → yantaṃ assa (s2, s3) | yantamassa (pts1, mr)
pv21:49.3: paripūrayanto → ninnānabhipūrayanto (bj, pts2) | ninnāni hi pūrayanto (s2, s3, pts1)
pv21:54.1: Tisahassāni sūdāni hi → tisahassāni sūdā hi (bj, pts2) | tisahassāni sūdāni (s2, s3, mr) | janā tisahassā sūdā (pts1)
pv21:54.4: vāvaṭā → vyāvaṭā (bj, pts2) | pāvaṭā (s2, s3, pts1)
pv21:68.3: Avidūreva buddhassa → avidūre ca buddhassa (pts1) | avidūre sambuddhassa (pts2, mr)
